root.name: Gods
root.description: OverviewAs Hercules, you must face the Gods themselves though 12 different levels.Critical ReceptionWhen the SNES version was released Electronic Gaming Monthly gave the scores of 7,7,5,6 saying, "...faithful to the original and even better as a Super NES cart. The strategy aspect is a definite plus especially with the hidden rooms and intricate puzzles. The pseudo artificial intelligence for the skill level is cool and works quite well".
